info.name: ORACLE Hospitality OPERA Cloud Rest APIs
info.description:
# Oracle Hospitality APIs
Accelerate your integration to Oracle Hospitality OPERA Cloud using these easy to use, secure REST APIs.

For more information visit <https://www.oracle.com/industries/hospitality/integration-platform/>.

<https://opensource.org/licenses/UPL>.  A copy of the license is
also reproduced below.

distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or
implied.

request.description: To fetch reservation from OPERA using ID
To create reservation in OPERA with minimum information in the request.
